name: DO Configuration
description: 0:Off;  1: Load Control Mode;  2: Grounding Fault  Indication;  3: MicroGrid System Mode

name: Load Control mode
description: 0: Timing mode; 1: ON/OFF mode; 2: Power optimized mode; 3: Disable

name: Load 1 power optimized mode: Start hour
Load 1 power optimized mode: Start minute
Load 1 power optimized mode: End hour
Load 1 power optimized mode: End minute
EMS mode selection
description: 0: Self-consumption  mode (Default); 2: Forced mode; 3: External EMS mode; 4:VPP

name: Charge/discharge power
description: (1) 0~5000W  Default:1000W  (SH3.0-6.0RS); (2) 0-100% of BDC rated power (RO register 5628). Pay attention to Unit Coeff difference.(SH5.0 10.0RT)
